item.title: Hello World - My Journey into Backend Development
item.description:
Hey there, I’m Ansh Wasan ðŸ‘‹

I’m a backend developer and a 4th-year B.Tech student at Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University. This blog is where I share my learnings, experiences, and insights from my journey in software development.

What I’ll Be Writing About

My primary focus is backend development, so you can expect posts covering:

  • API Design & Development - RESTful APIs, GraphQL, best practices
  • Database Systems - SQL, NoSQL, query optimization, data modeling
  • System Design - Scalability, microservices, distributed systems
  • DevOps Essentials - Docker, CI/CD, deployment strategies
  • Backend Frameworks - Spring Boot, Node.js, Django, and more

Why Backend?

There’s something incredibly satisfying about building the invisible infrastructure that powers applications. While users interact with beautiful frontends, it’s the backend that handles the heavy liftingâ€”processing data, managing authentication, ensuring security, and making everything work seamlessly.
